title: Input schema for Instagram Posts scraper
description:
Get data from Instagram profiles
Important: Residential proxy is required to use this scraper!
If you don't have them, please contact us on support@apify.com

name.title: name
name.description: Provide a profile URL of the account you want to scrape the posts from.

profile.title: Instagram username(s)
profile.description: Provide a profile URL of the account you want to scrape the posts from.

domain.title: domain
domain.description: Provide a profile URL of the account you want to scrape the posts from.
